Speaker: You
Text: Ahhh... This is the life.

Speaker: You
Text: The warm and comforting feel of the sun on a quiet afternoon.

Speaker: You
Text: Its been a while since I've been able to relax like this.

Speaker: Phone
Text: *Ring ring* *Ring ring*

Speaker: You
Text: … … ... Hello?
Heeeeyyyyyyyyyyyyy there champiooooon| you having a nice break?

Speaker: You
Text: Oh! I'm great boss| what's up?

Speaker: Boss
Text: Well first of all you know the company loves and appreciates the work you do right?

Speaker: Boss
Text: You've helped us out a ton and all…

Speaker: You
Text: Haha thank you thank you| am I maybe getting a raise!?

Speaker: Boss
Text: Uhh... Hmm. Not quite.

Speaker: Boss
Text: We had an executive meeting a couple days ago and talks about cutting costs became a hot topic.

Speaker: You
Text: Let me stop you there| shouldn't you be bringing this up with accounting? Not really my specialty.

Speaker: Boss
Text: Still not really what I'm trying to say here…

Speaker: Boss
Text: Yes... Sorry to say we're letting you go| but don't worry. With your resu-

Speaker: You
Text: W-What?! I've helped this company grow from only a few people to where it is today!

Speaker: Boss
Text: This wasn't easy for us either. Its just that yeah you've been a great help and all but…

Speaker: Boss
Text: We think you're taking too long of a vacation for how much we're paying you.

Speaker: You
Text: This is the first break I've taken since the company got on its feet!

Speaker: Boss
Text: Well... um its pretty busy over here and I've got a meeting in a bit. Good luck and thanks for everything.

Speaker: Phone
Text: *Call cuts*

Speaker: You
Text: No way... what am I going to do…
